price: (Nuhu aravuga ati) “Kandi rwose (ibyo bigirwamana) byayobeje benshi. Bityo (yewe Allah), ntuzagire ikindi wongerera ababangikanyamana kitari ubuyobe.”
arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīran walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālan
